long_description: Recover from a long day on the trail with a great night's sleep on the Therm-a-Rest LuxuryMAP(TM) sleeping pad; it's been updated with light and soft fabrics to improve comfort and reduce bulk. Part of the Camp & Comfort(TM) series, this pad is created for campers whose greatest interest is sleeping comfort; perfect for car campers, family campers and base campers. Thick and warm 3 in. pad features expanded die-cut foam in high-pressure areas and full-density foam in low-pressure areas for great cushioning from the cold, hard ground. Updated with lighter, softer fabrics over previous seasons on both top and bottom of the pad to improve the softness and feel while reducing weight and bulk. Self-inflating pad has an R-Value of 6.8. The Therm-a-Rest LuxuryMAP sleeping pad includes a stuff sack.
